DESCRIPTION:
Continued ill-shooter about a hitman Jackie Estacado, who creates his affairs under the protection of (or rather, cursing) otherworldly darkness. Since that time, Jackie has grown to the position of a mafia boss and got into a full-scale war between gangsters - so his "dark" abilities will be a place to roam. Studio Digital Extremes is going to give a realistic picture of the game and apply the technology sat-shading that simulates two-dimensional drawing.
